Manx: Cre’n phadeyr va marish Adam ayns yn gharey, as marish Noah ayns yn arg. Cha vel eh credjal ayns yn irree seose reesht, agh cha vel eh gobbal fockle jeh’n chredjue Chreestee.
English: Which prophet was with Adam in the garden, and with Noah in the Ark? He doesn’t believe in the reserrection, but he does not reject a word of the Christian fath.
Diplomatic: Cren’n phadeyr va marish Adam ayns yn gaarey. As marish Noah ayns yn arg. Cha vell eh credjal ayns yn irree seose reesht, agh cha vell eh ghobbal fockle jeh’n credjue Chreestee.

Manx: Myr ren mee jeeaghyn harrish boalley my chashtal honnick mee yn marroo cur lesh ny bioee ersooyl
English: As I looked over the wall of my castle, I saw the dead bringing the living away.
Diplomatic: Mor ren mee jeeaghyn harrish bayley my chashtal honnick mee yn marroochur lesh ny bioe ersooyl
